sections.heading: Usury; civil proceedings; testimony of lender compellable
sections.text: Any person charged with taking illegal interest may be required to answer touching the same, on oath, in any civil proceeding.SourceLaws 1879, § 6, p. 114;R.S.1913, § 3351;C.S.1922, § 2839;C.S.1929, § 45-106;R.S.1943, § 45-111.
